data.title: St Mary's Church
data.meta_description: We are proud partners with St Mary’s Church.  Reverend Hugh Lea Wilson from St Marys Church is a regular visitor for assemblies and collective worship.   We also enjoy participating in church events such as Messy Harvest, Messy Easter and Messy Christmas. Further info about the local church please click link below… St Mary’s Church Family […]
data.text:
We are proud partners with St Mary’s Church. Reverend Hugh Lea Wilson from St Marys Church is a regular visitor for assemblies and collective worship. We also enjoy participating in church events such as Messy Harvest, Messy Easter and Messy Christmas.

Further info about the local church please click link below…

St Mary’s Church
